name: Coffee Break Mazes
description:
Do you remember when our computers came preloaded with those very simple games, minesweeper, solitaire...  That was nice, and I miss small, pleasant little digital diversions to click on absentmindedly during a break.

Coffee Break Mazes features:
* 3 maze styles and 3 exit types for a total of 9 games modes.
* Several levels of map memory, for customizable difficulty.
* An ample selection of pixel-art graphics and colors to create your ideal look & feel.

Planned features:
* save your favorite graphics setups.
* save mazes and share with others.
* load maps from Tiled Editor.

Bug reports are always welcome!
Hope you enjoy.
